column1: Please check all that apply to continue
column2: Have any of your personal online accounts ever been hacked or did an unauthorized person log into one of your accounts?
column3: Do you know what 2-factor authentication means? (also called multi-factor authentication and 2FA) is?
column4: Do you have 2 factor authentication (also called multi-factor authentication) set up for one or more of your online accounts?
column5: Does any of your online accounts require you to enter a security code sent to you via text message or email to login?
column6: Was it easy to set up?
column8: Does any of your online accounts require you to confirm your login via a prompt on your phone?
column9: Was it easy to set up?
column11: Does any of your online accounts require you to provide a code from an app on your phone to login

column15: Was it easy to set up?
column17: When you connect to one of your online accounts, do you need to insert a usb device into your computer to confirm you identity?

column20: Did you enable 2 Factor Authentication for your Google or Facebook account?
column21: Which method of 2 Factor Authentication do you use? (You can select multiples) - Selected Choice
column22: Which method of 2 Factor Authentication do you use? (You can select multiples) - Other - Text
column23: Are there any inconveniences to using 2FA? (You can select multiples) - Selected Choice
column24: Why did you enable 2 factor authentication? (you can select multiple responses)
column25: Why did you not enable 2 factor authentication? (you can select multiple responses)
column26: Do you use Google or Facebook to log into other account? Did you register for some other accounts using your Google or Facebook account?
column27: What is the highest level of education you have completed?
column29: What field is your current profession in?
column30: What gender do you identify to?
column31: What are your political preferences? - Selected Choice
column32: Where do you get your news from? (You can select multiples) - Selected Choice
